plugin.name: banners
plugin.title: Banners
plugin.description: Allows Users and Administrator to add banners
plugin.author: Alex

emails.email: New banner was added at {site_name}. Details Owner: {username}, Creation Date: {date}, Status: {status}, Link: {link}

Dear {username},
Your banner in {site_name} was activated.
______________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration Team

email.subject: Your banner has been expired on {site_name}

emails.email:
Dear {username},
Your banner on {site_name} has been expired.
______________________________ Thank you, {site_name} Administration Team

Payment was successfully accepted: Payment details: Owner: {username} Banner ID: {id} Gateway: {gateway} Transaction ID: {txn} Item: {item} Item Price: {price} Date: {date} Check Transactions manager to check this payment.
Banner has been edited at {site_name}. Details Owner: {username}, Creation Date: {date}, Status: {status}, Link: {link}

phrases.phrase: Enter 0 to make the banner active for an unlimited period
Enter 0 to make the banner active for an unlimited views
Check the boxes to activate them for the plan
Click [here] to add a banner box
Click [here] to add a banner plan
The Owner does not exist, please check the field
Number of banners at a time
Sets a number of banners displayed in the box at a time
There are no banner plans, please contact the Administrator to resolve this issue
No banners added yet. Please [click] to add a new one
The banner has been successfully removed
Thank you! Your banner has been successfully added and activated.
Thank you! Your banner has been successfully added and is awaiting to be reviewed by the Administrator.
Are you sure you want to remove {plan} banner plan? The banner will be removed without being moved to the Trash Box
Remove the banner plan with all related data listed above
Are you sure you want to remove {box} banner box?
Remove the banner box with all related data listed above
The banner has been successfully added
The banner has been successfully edited
Your payment has been canceled, please contact the site administrator for getting details
There are no banner plans, Please add a new one
There are no banner boxes, Please [click] to add a new one
If you change the: Side, Width or Height; all related banners on this box will set status Approval
The all checked banners has been set as Active
The all checked banners has been set as Approved
The all checked banners has been successfully removed
The banner is awaiting to be approved by the Administrator.
Your banner plan has been successfully upgraded.
The banner has been successfully edited
You not have uploaded pictures, please upload picture.
Please select your Flash banner from computer.
Availability format swf, please upload banner in swf format.
You canÂ´t change the value for this banners box.
If you change the: Width or Height; all related banners on this box will set status Approval
You cannot change status until you add a box to the plan. You have to add at least a box to make it work.
If you change the plan at this stage the banner uploaded will be removed. Are you sure you want to proceed?
